Hello!

Any news about this discussion?

 

Thanks a lot!

create a route object, then add   PointLatLong   objects to the (i think) points  collection

thats how i do it

Hello paulmoliver, thanks for the fast reply!

If I do what you say I get the "best" (shortest\faster) route, but I want to draw a direct line between my 2 points.
no, dont call any of the routing functions, just use the route object, and add the 2 points in the form of a PointLongLat   object , it is real simple

Create a collections.generic.list of   PointLatLng   points,   then

create a GMapRoute  object  giving this collection and a name.

now simply  add this route object to the Routes collection of the map.

Perfect.. it works fine!thanks!

Can I change color for the route?

How can I handle route mouse click?

Thanks again for the fast answers!

set the Route.Color

 

as for mouse clicks, thats something we were discussing earlier today, no simple solution though yet
